text: Sometimes webhooks in workflows is a solution depending on your tier, not the nicest of solutions since other people can then see / edit / delete the workflows but if you just need to get the job done

<#CCQ7H31D5|developer-tools> <#C2YHAHB6K|api> <#C22PJ878V|random> <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> <#C22PU4LV8|general> Has anyone found a viable workaround for bulk creating Snippets? I currently have 328 snippets to manually create due to a platform transition if Superman doesn't show up to save the day...:smiling_face_with_tear:

Also, upvote <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Importing-snippets/idi-p/933273|here> if there is literally no solution!
